entrance.name: Walter White's House
entrance.description: You wake up from an exceptionally long nap on the couch that you do not remember taking.

items.name: Key
items.description: A small rusty key for some sort of door.

items.name: Paper
items.description: How to make money: 1. Create drugs 2. Sell drugs 3. Get money and be rich.

garage.name: Garage
garage.description: A dark room with a 2003 Pontiac Aztek.

backyard.name: Backyard
backyard.description: A dusty patch of grass and a rickety lawn chair.

frontdoor.name: Front Door
frontdoor.description: The front porch with a view of the street. A rusty mailbox sits here.
